description:
The news of the defeat of the Emperors of the Sea spreads across the world. Luffy enjoys the banquet but just as he is about to make a toast, an enraged Kid comes in to strike him. The reason behind his action surprises Luffy
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea!
Ein feierliches Bankett! – Die neuen Kaiser der Meere!
La fête de la victoire. Les nouveaux Empereurs des mers !
Shukusai no Utage! Atarashiki Umi no Koutei-tachi!
祝祭の宴! 新しき海の皇帝達!
